alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 24 at 8:51AM MST until November 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Periods of accumulating Snow. Total snow accumulations ranging anywhere from 2 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Entire Tri-State area. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ Saturday November 25th. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions associated with accumulating snow on area roadways. This includes the Interstate 70 corridor in eastern Colorado and northwest Kansas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light winds will accompany this system. Blowing and drifting snow are not expected. The majority of accumulating snow is anticipated to occur during the daylight hours today and Saturday. Little or no snow may fall late tonight and early Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and exercise additional caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
